headline: PPL (NYSE:PPL) Declares Quarterly Dividend Of US$0.27 Per Share
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) has recently affirmed a quarterly dividend of $0.27 per share, reinforcing its commitment to returning value to shareholders. Over the last quarter, the stock moved up 3%, a growth that aligns moderately with the broader market's climb of 5% in the same period. The company's solid earnings performance, with Q1 2025 net income rising to $414 million, coupled with strong earnings guidance through 2028, likely provided a stable backdrop to PPL's share price movement...
